mapper.select: SELECT id, customer_name, address, tel, hashed_password, email, created_at, updated_at, version FROM customers WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers ( customer_name, address, tel, hashed_password, email, created_at, updated_at, version) VALUES ( #{customerName}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{hashedPassword}, #{email}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), 1 )
INSERT INTO creditcards ( encrypted_creditno, customer_id, created_at, updated_at, version) VALUES ( #{encryptedCreditno}, #{customer.id}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET customer_name = #{customerName}, address = #{address}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, update_date = current_timestamp(), version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
UPDATE creditcard SET encrypted_creditno = #{encryptedCreditno}, customer_id = #{customer.id}, update_date = current_timestamp(), version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
UPDATE customer SET hashed_password = #{hashedPassword}, update_date = current_timestamp(), version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
